cases.title: Human Factors Engineering Expert Witness Not Allowed
cases.description: Plaintiff's Human Factors Expert Witness was deemed speculative and unnecessary in a trip and fall case.

cases.title: Fire Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Despite Lack of Advanced Degree
cases.description: The court ruled a Fire Expert Witness could testify as to the origin of a garage fire despite never having attended college.

cases.title: Biomechanics Expert Witness Testifies in Case Despite No Scientific Testing
cases.description: A Biomechanics Expert Witness was allowed to testify that walking into a chair could generate enough force to cause a tendon rupture.
